author: CrankyOne

review: Good quality picture for a streaming device. Way better than ps4.
author: wayne cockefair

review: Very easy to set up, easy user interface, good idea overall but after 10 days it just quit working, wouldn't turn on, nothing but a black screen. Back it went and plugged in the replacement..worked perfectly, here we are 3 weeks later and now it freezes while loading some things..loads others but then turns to a gray screen. Tried all the trouble shooting, nothing worked. So back it goes..2 fire sticks and barely a month later, this time I'm getting my money back and buying the Roku. For such a large company you'd think a product would work better..very disappointed.
author: Sara
